content.en: Drug Discovery AI: Scientists are exploring the potential of algorithms, specifically deep learning and convolutional neural networks, to improve various aspects of drug discovery. These algorithms are being used to predict protein-ligand binding affinities, classify ligand-binding pockets in proteins, and identify native-like protein-ligand complexes. Additionally, machine learning models are being developed to predict the performance of docking protocols. These advancements in algorithmic technology have the potential to greatly enhance the efficiency and accuracy of drug discovery processes.
content.da: AI inden for lægemiddeludvikling: Forskere undersøger potentialet i algoritmer, specifikt dyb læring og konvolutionelle neurale netværk, for at forbedre forskellige aspekter af lægemiddeludvikling. Disse algoritmer bruges til at forudsige protein-ligand bindingsaffiniteter, klassificere ligand-bindingslommer i proteiner og identificere native-lignende protein-ligand komplekser. Derudover udvikles maskinlæringsmodeller til at forudsige ydeevnen af dockingprotokoller. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk teknologi har potentiale til i høj grad at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af lægemiddeludviklingsprocesser.
